stories.text: I got my credit fixed within just 2 weeks working with Doomhacks@bk.ru , took down all negatives and boosted up my Experian score up to 830 which i never thought was possible at first but right after they finished up I was glad they kept to their word .. contact them as well if you got the same issues and need it sorted out .. +1 812 509 3064

stories.text: I've recently been thinking about starting an ad network with a new format for ads. I think the format is more engaging for viewers and more useful for advertisers. However, I'm not sure where i should start developing it, what would be your advice for how to develop the ads? The ads will be web based and square dimensions but I'm just not sure what the current best practises are for adtech. I'm competent with the backend but I'm not sure how to develop the ads.
stories.title: Ask HN: Advice on starting a niche ad network
